text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump CORONAVIRUS briefing! Citizens ONLY want to hear about CORONAVIRUS updates!!!! New virus, Obama had nothing to do with this virus!! Idiot!!! Americans are paying for your stupid tariffs!! Liar, liar, liar!! Liar 🤥
